omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select 
	l1.NHSNumber, 
	l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
	l5.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	max(l1.CDSActivityDate) as CDSActivityDate, 
	l1.TotalPreviousPregnancies
from omop_staging.cds_line01 l1
	left outer join omop_staging.cds_line05 l5
		on l1.MessageId = l5.MessageId
where l1.TotalPreviousPregnancies is not null 
	and l1.NHSNumber is not null 
	and (l1.CdsRecordType = '140' or l1.CdsRecordType = '120')																			
group by 
	l1.NHSNumber, 
	l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
	l5.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	l1.CDSActivityDate, 
	l1.TotalPreviousPregnancies;

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	l1.NHSNumber, 
	l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
	l5.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	max(l1.CDSActivityDate) as CDSActivityDate, 
	l1.TotalPreviousPregnancies
from omop_staging.cds_line01 l1
	left outer join omop_staging.cds_line05 l5
		on l1.MessageId = l5.MessageId
where l1.TotalPreviousPregnancies is not null 
	and l1.NHSNumber is not null 
	and (l1.CdsRecordType = '140' or l1.CdsRecordType = '120')																			
group by 
	l1.NHSNumber, 
	l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
	l5.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	l1.CDSActivityDate, 
	l1.TotalPreviousPregnancies;

omopColumns.name: observation_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `4078008`. Number of previous pregnancies

omopColumns.name: observation_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. EHR administration record

omopColumns.name: value_as_string

dataSource.name: TotalPreviousPregnancies
dataSource.description: PREGNANCY TOTAL PREVIOUS PREGNANCIES is the number of previous pregnancies resulting in one or more REGISTRABLE BIRTHS.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	l1.NHSNumber, 
	l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
	l5.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	max(l1.CDSActivityDate) as CDSActivityDate, 
	l1.TotalPreviousPregnancies

	left outer join omop_staging.cds_line05 l5
		on l1.MessageId = l5.MessageId
where l1.TotalPreviousPregnancies is not null 
	and l1.NHSNumber is not null 
	and (l1.CdsRecordType = '140' or l1.CdsRecordType = '120')																			
group by 
	l1.NHSNumber, 
	l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier,
	l5.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	l1.CDSActivityDate, 
	l1.TotalPreviousPregnancies;
